mutation {
	updateDataset(
		id: "{{ .dataset_id }}"
		input: {
			name: "Updated Name"
			description: "Updated description"
			repo: "someotherrepo"
			pii: sensitive
			keywords: ["keyword1", "keyword2"]
			piiTags: "{\"test\":}"
		}
	) {
		name
		description
		repo
		pii
		keywords
	}
}

RETURNS
OPTION errors[0].extensions=IGNORE
OPTION errors[0].locations=IGNORE
OPTION errors[0].message=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
    "errors": [
        {
            "message": "Cannot query field \"piiTags\" on type "Dataset"."
        }
    ]
}
